last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Problem
last_episode_to_air.overview: Holmes and Watson travel to Europe to escape Moriarty's vengeance.

name: Sherlock
overview: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

seasons.name: Series 1
seasons.overview: When a chance encounter brings soldier John Watson into Sherlock's life, it's apparent the two men couldn't be more different, but Sherlock's intellect coupled with John's pragmatism soon forges an unbreakable alliance as they investigate a series of baffling cases together.

seasons.name: Series 2
seasons.overview: A Royal scandal, a dazzling game of cat and mouse. The seductive Irene Adler is cold, calculating, brilliant. Has Sherlock finally met his match?

seasons.name: Series 3
seasons.overview: Sherlock is back, but will things ever be the same again?

seasons.name: Series 4
seasons.overview: The fourth series begins with the nationâ€™s favourite detective, the mercurial Sherlock Holmes, back once more on British soil, as Doctor Watson and his wife, Mary, prepare for their biggest ever challenge - becoming parents for the first time.

tagline: A new sleuth for the 21st century.

episodes.name: A Study in Pink
episodes.overview: A war hero, invalided home from Afghanistan, meets a strange but charismatic genius who is looking for a flatmate; it is London, 2010, and Dr Watson and Sherlock Holmes are meeting for the first time. A string of impossible suicides has Scotland Yard baffled - and only one man can help.

episodes.name: The Blind Banker
episodes.overview: A mysterious cipher is being scrawled on the walls around London. The first person to see the cipher is dead within hours of reading it. Sherlock plunges into a world of codes and symbols, consulting with London's best graffiti artists. He soon learns that the city is in the grip a gang of international smugglers, a secret society called the Black Lotus.

episodes.name: The Great Game
episodes.overview: A strange clue in an empty room, a blood-soaked car, a priceless Old Master, a deranged bomber. With the clock ticking, the curtain rises on a battle of wits between Sherlock, John and the shadowy stranger who seems to know all the answers...

1.name: Series 1
1.overview: When a chance encounter brings soldier John Watson into Sherlock's life, it's apparent the two men couldn't be more different, but Sherlock's intellect coupled with John's pragmatism soon forges an unbreakable alliance as they investigate a series of baffling cases together.

episodes.name: A Scandal in Belgravia
episodes.overview: Blackmail threatens the monarchy and Sherlock is about to meet the woman who beats him.

episodes.name: The Hounds of Baskerville
episodes.overview: A hound from hell. Sherlock's most famous case. But is a monster really stalking Dartmoor?

episodes.name: The Reichenbach Fall
episodes.overview: The return of Moriarty. The crime of the century. Can Sherlock possibly survive?

2.name: Series 2
2.overview: A Royal scandal, a dazzling game of cat and mouse. The seductive Irene Adler is cold, calculating, brilliant. Has Sherlock finally met his match?

episodes.name: The Empty Hearse
episodes.overview: Two years on from reports of his Reichenbach Fall demise, Sherlock resurfaces as London comes under threat of a huge terrorist attack. John, though, has mixed feelings â€“ he's delighted by the return of his best friend, but harbours worries that the consulting detective's reappearance will have an adverse affect on his settled domestic life, in particular his romance with Mary Morstan.

episodes.name: The Sign of Three
episodes.overview: Sherlock faces his biggest challenge of all â€“ delivering a Best Manâ€™s speech on Johnâ€™s wedding day! But all isnâ€™t quite as it seems. Mortal danger stalks the reception â€“ and someone might not make it to the happy coupleâ€™s first dance. Sherlock must thank the bridesmaids, solve the case and stop a killer.

episodes.name: His Last Vow
episodes.overview: A case of stolen letters leads Sherlock Holmes into a long conflict with Charles Augustus Magnussen, the Napoleon of blackmail, and the one man he truly hates. But how do you tackle a foe who knows the personal weakness of every person of importance in the Western world?

3.name: Series 3
3.overview: Sherlock is back, but will things ever be the same again?

episodes.name: The Six Thatchers
episodes.overview: Why is someone destroying images of Margaret Thatcher? Is there a madman on the loose? Or is there a much darker purpose at work?

episodes.name: The Lying Detective
episodes.overview: Sherlock faces perhaps the most chilling enemy of his long career: the powerful and seemingly unassailable Culverton Smith â€“ a man with a very dark secret indeed.

episodes.name: The Final Problem
episodes.overview: Holmes and Watson travel to Europe to escape Moriarty's vengeance.

4.name: Series 4
4.overview: The fourth series begins with the nationâ€™s favourite detective, the mercurial Sherlock Holmes, back once more on British soil, as Doctor Watson and his wife, Mary, prepare for their biggest ever challenge - becoming parents for the first time.
